headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP) Is A “Cash Flow Machine,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 11 Fresh Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About While Discussing AI-Led “American Renaissance”. AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is another new-age advertising company that enables advertisers to digitally manage and run their campaigns. Its shares have gained a rather paltry 3.8% year-to-date as […]
